Uses of Class
Jaume.Color

  • Packages that use Color 
    Package Description
    Calin  
    Jaume  
    Pau  

    • Uses of Color in Calin

      Methods in Calin that return Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color Player.getColor()
      Getter to get the color of the Player
      Methods in Calin with parameters of type Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void Player.play(Board board, int score, Color color)
      The function to make the player play.
      void Human.play(Board board, int score, Color color)
      In this case, knowing that it will be a human that will play, we made this function ask for the coordinates of the piece to move and the coordinates of the position to move to, made in real Chess Board numeration.
      void Machine.play(Board board, int score, Color color)
      In this case, the computer has to decide which move to make, so we added the minimax AI to make it happen
      Constructors in Calin with parameters of type Color 
      Constructor and Description
      Human(java.lang.String name, Color color)
      Human constructor, giving it's name and color
      Machine(java.lang.String name, Color color, int depth)
      Machine constructor, which gives its name, color and depth
      Player(java.lang.String name, Color color)
      Player constructor.
